maintenance.soil: Slightly acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, may take 2-3h moderate sunlight
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
